byline.contributor: Christopher D. Shea contributed reporting from London.

abstract: Russia claims Pres Vladimir V Putin called singer Elton John to apologize for prank call by comedians impersonating Russian leader, and to express openness to John's suggestion of meeting to discuss gay rights in Russia.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Putin called Mr. John, who had asked for a meeting with the Russian president to talk about gay rights, about a week after the singer-songwriter received a prank call from two satirists.

headline.main: Vladimir Putin Calls Elton John, This Time for Real
headline.print_headline: Putin Calls Elton John, This Time for Real

snippet: Mr. Putin called Mr. John, who had asked for a meeting with the Russian president to talk about gay rights, about a week after the singer-songwriter received a prank call from two satirists.
